event.summary: 01/28/1993: Suspected Maoists set off a car bomb in front to the IBM offices on Javier Prado Este Avenue in the La Molina neighborhood of Lima, Peru. Eleven people were injured and considerable damage was caused in this incident.
event.target1: IBM offices on Javier Prado Este Avenue in Lima
event.weapdetail: 300 kg ammonium nitrate fuel oil car bomb
event.propcomment: The car bomb caused extensive damage to the IBM offices and surrounding homes.
event.scite1: Edward F. Mickolus, Terrorism, 1992-1995: A Chronology of Events and a Selectively Annotated Bibliography,Â Westport, CT: Greenwood Press, 1997.
event.scite2: MIPT Terrorism Knowledge Base. "TKB Incident Page: Unknown Group attacked Business target (Jan. 28, 1993, Peru)." Website. Available from http://www.tkb.org/Incident.jsp?incID=7008.
